  • Method Details

    • simulationPeriodic

      public void simulationPeriodic()

    • addFollower

      public void addFollower(ManipMotor followerMotor, boolean isInverted)
      Sets the ManipMotor to follow another ManipMotor.
      Parameters:
      followerMotor - ManipMotor to follow the lead motor.
      isInverted - whether to invert the follower or not.

    • addAbsoluteEncoder

      public void addAbsoluteEncoder(AbsoluteEncoder absEncoder)
      Adds an absolute encoder to sync to on init. This is not used for actual control but recommended to keep arm position on boot.

    • setSyncAbsEncoderInit

      public void setSyncAbsEncoderInit(boolean syncAbsEncoderInit)
      Determines whether to sync the absolute encoder in the ManipArm class or not. This is enabled by default.

    • overrideArmMech

      public void overrideArmMech(Mechanism2d arm2d, MechanismRoot2d armRoot, MechanismLigament2d armMech)
      Set up an arm MechanismLigament2d for simulation. This is specific to your bot.

    • nearMax

      public boolean nearMax(double toleranceDegrees)
      Near the maximum Angle of the arm within X degrees.
      Parameters:
      toleranceDegrees - Degrees close to maximum of the Arm.
      Returns:
      is near the maximum of the arm.

    • nearMin

      public boolean nearMin(double toleranceDegrees)
      Near the minimum angle of the Arm in within X degrees.
      Parameters:
      toleranceDegrees - Tolerance of the Arm.
      Returns:
      is near the minimum of the arm.

    • synchronizeAbsoluteEncoder

      public void synchronizeAbsoluteEncoder()
      Synchronizes inbuilt encoder to the setup absolute encoder. Syncs on init by default.

    • runSysIdRoutine

      public Command runSysIdRoutine()
      Runs the SysId routine to tune the Arm
      Returns:
      SysId Routine command

    • reachSetpoint

      public void reachSetpoint(double setpoint)
      Run the control loop to reach and maintain the setpoint from the preferences.

    • runArm

      public void runArm(double speed)
      Basic method to run the arm at commanded speed.

      Runs reachSetpoint as a Command.

      Runs runArm as a Command.

      public void setTopLimitSwitch(Trigger topLimitHit)
      Sets the Trigger for when the top limit switch is hit for ManipArm.
      Parameters:
      topLimitHit - top limit switch Trigger.

    • setBottomLimitSwitch
